answerText: Dirac equation[10] Solutions to the Dirac equation predicted the existence of these particles, which have the same mass as their antiparticles the electrons but an opposite charge.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 8 | 22 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This equation is usually compactly written as a gamma matrix times the covariant derivative of the wave function equals the mass times the wave function.  [10] Identify this relativistic modification of the Schrodinger equation that models the behavior of spin-one-half particles.
